misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a competitor known for his colorful language and unwavering determination, hails from Hirsala Golf. He is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, and 2025 will mark his tenth appearance at the event.

Over the years, Simo has secured three Hector Trophée titles, demonstrating his ability to perform under pressure. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his competitive spirit suggests he will continue to seek the individual title.

For the 2025 season, Simo has adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter, a change that he hopes will improve his performance on the greens. Paired with his fiery attitude, it remains to be seen if this change in equipment will bring him further glory at the Hector Trophée.
